attributes.action: Britain should immediately abandon its go-it-alone attitude to climate change
attributes.additional_details: Climate change, if it exists, and if it is caused by greenhouse gases (which is unlikely), and if it actually is detrimental to the majority, will not be helped by Britain alone obliging itself to cut greenhouse gases by building pointless wind farms which are a waste of money, inefficient, noisy, largely built by foreign companies and an eyesore
